summary: **Venom: The Last Dance** is an upcoming superhero movie about the Marvel character Venom. It's the third Venom film and part of Sony's Spider-Man Universe. Tom Hardy returns as Eddie Brock/Venom, on the run from their two worlds. Kelly Marcel wrote and directed the film, which also stars Chiwetel Ejiofor and Juno Temple. Production started in Spain in June 2023, faced delays due to a strike, and wrapped up in February 2024. The movie is set to release on October 25, 2024, in the United States.
title: Venom The Last Dance
